resources.string: Released in 1992. Dirt is a defining album of Grunge.
Take Off Your Pants and Jacket
Released in 2001. I listened to this album religiously doing my paper round.
Released in 1971. I could have chosen any of the first 5 but this is my favourite.
Released in 1990. Something a bit bluesy but with some power.
Released in 1995. Death really found their groove in this record.
